mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_comment (post_id, user_id, comment, created_date, created_id, updated_date, updated_id) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{comment}, NOW(), #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.post_id, c.user_id, c.comment, c.created_date, c.updated_date, u.user_nickname FROM tb_comment c JOIN tb_user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.created_date ASC
SELECT comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment, created_date, updated_date FROM tb_comment WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
